Interface ShowBalance

All Known Subinterfaces:
LoanInterface, UpdateTables
All Known Implementing Classes:
DataSource, LoanForm, LoanInfo, LoanSummary, MainApplication, PDFHolder
public interface ShowBalance
This interface performs how an amount should be displayed.

    round(double value, int places)
    This method rounds a number to a given number of decimal places.

    • round

      default double round(double value, int places)
      This method rounds a number to a given number of decimal places.
      Parameters:
      value - The number to be rounded.
      places - The number of decimal places.
      Returns:
